lines.speaker: cornwall
lines.text: I will have my revenge ere I depart his house.

lines.speaker: edmund
lines.text: How, my lord, I may be censured, that nature thus gives way to loyalty, something fears me to think of.

lines.speaker: cornwall
lines.text: I now perceive, it was not altogether your brother's evil disposition made him seek his death; but a provoking merit, set a-work by a reprovable badness in himself.

lines.speaker: edmund
lines.text: How malicious is my fortune, that I must repent to be just! This is the letter he spoke of, which approves him an intelligent party to the advantages of France: O heavens! that this treason were not, or not I the detector!

lines.speaker: cornwall
lines.text: o with me to the duchess.

lines.speaker: edmund
lines.text: If the matter of this paper be certain, you have mighty business in hand.

lines.speaker: cornwall
lines.text: True or false, it hath made thee earl of Gloucester. Seek out where thy father is, that he may be ready for our apprehension.

lines.speaker: edmund
lines.text: [Aside]  If I find him comforting the king, it will stuff his suspicion more fully.--I will persevere in my course of loyalty, though the conflict be sore between that and my blood.

lines.speaker: cornwall
lines.text: I will lay trust upon thee; and thou shalt find a dearer father in my love.
